resources.description: Get a BUY/SELL/HOLD signal plus conviction only.

accepts.description: Get a BUY/SELL/HOLD signal plus conviction only.

symbol.description: Enter Coin Symbol for the AI Signal e.g. BTC ETH SOL etc.

resources.description: Base X Raid (small) — one payment creates a cluster of jobs for a single X post: 20 likes (≈ 0.5 USDC), 10 reposts (≈ 0.25 USDC), 10 comments (≈ 0.25 USDC). Per-slot price is 0.025 USDC; total is fixed at ≈ 1 USDC. Flow: call without X-PAYMENT returns 402 discovery; retry the exact same URL with X-PAYMENT to confirm payment and create/confirm the jobs.

accepts.description: Base X Raid (small) — one payment creates a cluster of jobs for a single X post: 20 likes (≈ 0.5 USDC), 10 reposts (≈ 0.25 USDC), 10 comments (≈ 0.25 USDC). Per-slot price is 0.025 USDC; total is fixed at ≈ 1 USDC. Flow: call without X-PAYMENT returns 402 discovery; retry the exact same URL with X-PAYMENT to confirm payment and create/confirm the jobs.

X-ITEM-URL.description: Optional alternative header for some clients; same semantics as url.

X-URL.description: Optional alternative to the url query parameter; same semantics.

url.description: Link to the X (Twitter) post to boost.

alreadyConfirmed.description: True when a previous payment already confirmed this cluster.

jobs.description: The created jobs (likes, reposts, comments, and optional bookmarks).

ok.description: True when payment is confirmed and the cluster jobs are created.

paid.description: Alias for ok; kept for backwards compatibility.

raidId.description: Shared cluster identifier for this raid; can be used to correlate the jobs returned by this endpoint.

url.description: The X URL used for this cluster.

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: WURK quick endpoints for buying a cluster of X engagement (likes, reposts, comments, bookmarks) on a single X (Twitter) post using USDC via x402.

resources.description: Get the latest news about a covered news topic, delivering the most recent 10 headlines.

accepts.description: Get the latest news about a covered news topic, delivering the most recent 10 headlines.

feed_categories.description: Comma separated list of feed categories. Available categories: ai, ai_agents, base, bitcoin, crypto, dats, defi, ethereum, hyperliquid, machine_learning, macro, perps, rwa, ripple, solana, tech

from_date.description: Get the news from this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

to_date.description: Get the news up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

token.description: Token address or symbol (e.g. BTC, ETH, SOL, etc.)

X-PAYMENT.description: Base64-encoded JSON PaymentPayload; automatically filled by x402scan

X-Budget.description: Optional budget amount in USD (e.g., $0.01). If not provided, defaults to $0.001

resources.description: Base → Solana USDC microbridge discovery. Default example uses 1.00 USDC deposited to the Base bridge wallet. Provide a Solana receiver address and an amount (min 0.01 USDC, max 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01) to create a concrete bridge quote. The bridge charges a 2.5% commission; the remainder is delivered as USDC on Solana.

accepts.description: Base → Solana USDC microbridge discovery. Default example uses 1.00 USDC deposited to the Base bridge wallet. Provide a Solana receiver address and an amount (min 0.01 USDC, max 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01) to create a concrete bridge quote. The bridge charges a 2.5% commission; the remainder is delivered as USDC on Solana.

amount.description: Amount in USDC to bridge from Base to Solana. Optional; minimum 0.01 USDC, maximum 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01 USDC. When omitted, defaults to 1.00 USDC.

receiver.description: Destination Solana wallet address that should receive bridged USDC.

amount_out_usdc.description: USDC amount delivered on Solana after commission.

base_payment_txid.description: Base transaction hash of the bridge payment (x402 settlement).

bridge_id.description: Internal bridge id for support and debugging.

ok.description: True when the bridge completed (sent or refunded).

payer_wallet.description: Base wallet that paid the bridge x402 payment.

receiver_wallet.description: Solana wallet that should receive bridged USDC.

refund_txid.description: Base transaction hash of the refund when the bridge failed.

sol_txid.description: Solana transaction id of the USDC transfer to the receiver.

status.description: Bridge status: 'sent' when Solana transfer succeeded, 'refunded' when Base refund was sent, or 'failed' when both send and refund failed.

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: x402Factory Base→Solana USDC microbridge for agents. Deposits USDC on Base and delivers USDC on Solana with a small commission.

resources.description: Mode-x402 is a complete library of signals and indicators for intelligent trading agents

accepts.description: Mode-x402 is a complete library of signals and indicators for intelligent trading agents

limit.description: Number of data points to compute

time_frame.description: Time frame for the indicator, e.g., '5m', '1h'

id.description: Unique identifier for the indicator instance

timestamp.description: ISO format date time of the data point

value.description: Value of the indicator at the timestamp

resources.description: Accepts JSON input and anonymizes sensitive information in the provided text using the selected provider (Azure or others).

accepts.description: Accepts JSON input and anonymizes sensitive information in the provided text using the selected provider (Azure or others).

resources.description: Lava SHA256 - A SHA256 string using 512 random pixels of live images of our lava lamps.

resources.description: Base X profile mini-endpoint. Fetches a full X profile and the 10 most recent tweets for a given handle, returning the raw profile data plus a trimmed tweet list with key engagement metrics and media. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

accepts.description: Base X profile mini-endpoint. Fetches a full X profile and the 10 most recent tweets for a given handle, returning the raw profile data plus a trimmed tweet list with key engagement metrics and media. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

handle.description: X handle (username) without the @ prefix, for example WURKDOTFUN or statikheadz.
Normalized X handle that was requested.

price_usdc.description: Fixed price charged for this call in USDC (6 decimals).

profile.description: Full upstream X profile payload for the user, including core fields like id, rest_id, name, screen_name, description, avatar, location and counters.

tweet_count.description: Number of recent tweets returned (up to 10).

tweets.description: Array of up to 10 recent tweets with trimmed but useful metadata: id, text (max 3000 chars; longer texts are truncated), created_at, language, basic user info, engagement metrics, media and links.

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: x402Factory Base endpoints for agents (notes, LLMs, TTS, Telegram, coin prices, payments, X profiles).

domain.description: Domain name to lookup in host.tld format (e.g., google.com). Subdomains are not allowed.

updated_datetime.description: Domain last updated date and time

success.description: Whether the whois lookup was successful

resources.description: Get detailed information for a specific Kalshi event by ticker symbol

resources.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using AI

accepts.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using AI

queryParams.prompt: Text prompt describing the image to generate

output.description: GenerateImageResult containing the generated images and metadata

imageUrl.description: Fetchable URL for the uploaded image

mediaType.description: IANA media type of the image

usage.description: Token usage information for the image generation

resources.description: Fund your Grove API Account with 1 USDC to tip creators on the internet.

accepts.description: Fund your Grove API Account with 1 USDC to tip creators on the internet.

Authorization.description: Bearer JWT for funding an existing Grove account. When omitted, the call creates and funds a new account instead.

X-PAYMENT.description: Base64-encoded x402 payment payload returned after signing the payment request described in the initial 402 response.

amount.description: Human-readable token amount to fund the tipping account. These funds can be used to tip creators on the internet. Examples: '0.01', '1', '1.05', '100.10'. Defaults to '1' when omitted. Token determined by 'token' parameter (default: USDC).

network.description: Network identifier. Supported: ethereum-mainnet, base-sepolia, base, solana-devnet, solana-testnet, solana-mainnet. Defaults to base when omitted. Account.network is set on first funding (immutable - represents VM type).

referral_code.description: Optional referral code from an existing user (e.g., 'GRV-ABC123'). Only applies to new account creation. If provided for existing accounts, it is ignored. Invalid codes don't block account creation but are reported in referral_status.

token.description: Token symbol. Defaults to USDC when omitted. Supported tokens vary by network. Check network token configuration.

ReferralStatus.description:
Status of referral code application during account creation.

Included in FundResponse to provide feedback on referral code processing.
Allows successful account creation even with invalid referral codes,
while still informing the user of the outcome.
ReferralStatus.title: ReferralStatus

output.description:
Response model for successful funding.

When creating a new account (no JWT provided):
- account_id, api_key, address, and client_address are populated
- Use api_key as Bearer token for future requests
- referral_code contains the new account's shareable referral code
- referral_status contains feedback on any provided referral code

When funding existing account (JWT provided):
- account_id and api_key are None
- address and client_address are populated
- referral_code and referral_status are None (referrals only apply to new accounts)
output.title: FundResponse

resources.description: Design LP composition, initial liquidity depth, fee tiers, and concentrated liquidity ranges across different DEXs

accepts.description: Design LP composition, initial liquidity depth, fee tiers, and concentrated liquidity ranges across different DEXs

resources.description: Calculate APR for liquidity pools across multiple chains (Arbitrum, Base, Ethereum). Tokens do not necessarily need to be token0 and token1 respectively in the pool, they are reordered automatically. Price range must be specified based on the ratio of token0 / token1. For example, if the provided token0 is ETH and the provided token1 is USDC, a correct price lower could be 1000 and price upper could be 8000. Viceversa, if the provided token0 is USDC and token1 is ETH, a correct price lower could be 0.000125 and price upper could be 0.001.

accepts.description: Calculate APR for liquidity pools across multiple chains (Arbitrum, Base, Ethereum). Tokens do not necessarily need to be token0 and token1 respectively in the pool, they are reordered automatically. Price range must be specified based on the ratio of token0 / token1. For example, if the provided token0 is ETH and the provided token1 is USDC, a correct price lower could be 1000 and price upper could be 8000. Viceversa, if the provided token0 is USDC and token1 is ETH, a correct price lower could be 0.000125 and price upper could be 0.001.

resources.description: Create a new order for AI Plushie collection with x402 payment

accepts.description: Create a new order for AI Plushie collection with x402 payment

resources.description: Base text-to-speech API paid via x402. Converts text input into a hosted audio URL. Dynamic pricing for TTS: the prepaid price is computed per request based on the input and charged upfront via x402. Prepaid price for pure discovery requests without text is an upper bound; clients should re-run discovery with their concrete input if they need an exact quote.

accepts.description: Base text-to-speech API paid via x402. Converts text input into a hosted audio URL. Dynamic pricing for TTS: the prepaid price is computed per request based on the input and charged upfront via x402. Prepaid price for pure discovery requests without text is an upper bound; clients should re-run discovery with their concrete input if they need an exact quote.

action.description: Optional action. Omit for TTS. Use 'list' to list available voices instead of generating speech.

text.description: Text to convert to speech when action is omitted (TTS mode). Required for paid TTS calls.

voice_id.description: Optional ElevenLabs voice_id. If omitted, a default narrator voice is used.

action.description: Action performed: 'tts' for text-to-speech, 'list' for voice listing.

chars.description: Number of characters used for pricing in TTS calls.

price_usdc.description: Price charged for this call in USDC (6 decimals, rounded up). Minimum is 0.001 USDC.

tts_url.description: Public URL of the generated audio file hosted on ImageKit (TTS only).

voice_id.description: Voice ID used for the TTS call (TTS only).

voices.description: For action=list: available voices with trimmed metadata (voice_id, name, accent, descriptive, age, language, use_case).

resources.name: CDP Facilitator
resources.description: Best-in-class x402 facilitator. Fee-free USDC settlement on Base Mainnet. KYT/OFAC checks on every transaction.

resources.name: Corbits
resources.description: A production grade facilitator which supports multi-network, multi-token, multi-payment schemes.

resources.name: Mogami facilitator
resources.description: A free, developer-focused, production-ready facilitator for x402 payments. Use it instantly online, or launch your own Docker image in seconds.

resources.name: OpenX402.ai Facilitator
resources.description: The first permissionless, gasless and omnichain x402 facilitator that any x402 server can use without login

resources.name: PayAI Facilitator
resources.description: Accept x402 payments on all networks including Avalanche, Base, Polygon, Sei, Solana, and more! Get started in less than 1 minute. Supports all tokens. No API Keys required.

resources.name: Treasure Facilitator
resources.description: Treasure x402 Facilitator available on Base and Base Sepolia. Supports EIP-3009 compliant tokens including USDC, MAGIC, SMOL, MIO, AI Frens tokens, and more.

resources.name: WorldFun Facilitator
resources.description: AWE World.fun’s x402 Facilitator enables fee-free EIP-3009 payments in USDC and other ERC-20 tokens, handling verification and settlement on Base so developers don’t need blockchain infrastructure.

resources.name: x402.rs Facilitator
resources.description: Independent, open-source facilitator in Rust. Easy to self-host, extend to new networks, or use via our hosted instance.
